title: The Emerald Empress Haaram: A Diamond & Gemstone Symphony
materials: meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut Diamonds (17.52 carats)
a single Ruby (1.18 carat) and lustrous South Sea Pearls (28.75 carats in necklace
features: A breathtaking, full-length Haaram designed with intricate floral and paisley motifs, pavonine design elements. The necklace features a stunning arrangement of round Emeralds interspersed with diamond-studded floral patterns. The pendant is a magnificent triangular design, studded with diamonds and a central emerald, with pearl drops (moti). Excellent craftsmanship and traditional setting techniques are evident throughout the piece.
colors: accented by the rich green of the Emeralds and the creamy luster of the South Sea Pearls.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaaham)
or other important ceremonies. Also suitable for high-profile parties and celebrations where you want to make a statement.
description: This exquisite Haaram is a true heirloom piece, embodying the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry design. The exceptional craftsmanship, combined with the use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, ruby and pearls, ensures both its beauty and lasting value. A statement piece, it is an investment and a legacy to be cherished for generations.
